name: Inca - Monumento
additionalNotes: Inca Cigars is the result of years of passion and experience in the tobacco industry. Inca Cigars has expanded its international reach, offering an exceptional smoking experience. Each Inca cigar is a tribute to the rich Peruvian tobacco tradition, made with 100% Peruvian tobacco, from the wrapper to the filling. Their products are more than a cigar, they are an experience.
